fields.name: datetime (ISO 8601 format)
fields.title: Date time
fields.description: Date and time of the hourly time period in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00 over which the measurements were averaged. Data is averaged from hh:30 to hh+1:29, where hh is the hour of the day [UTC]

fields.name: io_mixing_ratio (pptv)
fields.title: Iodine monoxide mixing ratio
fields.description: Quotient between the number density of iodine monoxide (IO) and the number density of the air or atmosphere at that same height, expressed in units of parts per trillion (1 out every 1e12 air molecules) or pptv [parts per trillion]

fields.name: io_mixing_ratio_unc (pptv)
fields.title: Iodine monoxide mixing ratio uncertainty
fields.description: Uncertainty in the iodine monoxide (IO) mixing ratio [parts per trillion]

fields.name: io_vcd (molec/cm^2)
fields.title: Vertical column density of iodine monoxide
fields.description: Vertical column density of iodine monoxide (IO) representing the vertical integration of the trace gas concentration profile [molecules per cm^2]

fields.name: io_vcd_unc (molec/cm^2)
fields.title: Vertical column density of iodine monoxide
fields.description: Uncertainty in the vertical column density of iodine monoxide (IO) [molecules per cm^2]
